text:
Image:VirginiaMadsenSFIFF06 adj.jpg|thumb|Virginia Madsen in 2006
Virginia Madsen (born September 11, 1961) is an American actress who acts mostly in movies. Her career began in the 1980s and has included many notable television and movie roles. Her best known role was Helen in "Candyman" (1992). Madsen was born in Chicago.
